title: Love Island's Cartier admits to having sex before marriage
text:
She's the 'born-again Christian' who wants to find a man who supports her religious beliefs.

But on Wednesday's episode of Love Island Australia, Cartier Surjan sensationally confessed to having had sex before marriage during a deep conversation with Adam Farrugia.

The 19-year-old brunette, who is a strong believer of the Christian faith, admitted to breaking the rules during one-on-one time with Adam by the pool.

Love Island Australia: 'Born-again Christian' Cartier Surjan, 19, admitted to having sex before marriage on Wednesday night's episode

Talking in a piece to camera, the tattooed hunk said Cartier's beliefs weren't going stop him from getting to know her.

During some one-on-one time together, the 27-year-old then asked how invested Cartier was in her religion.

'They said you were into church, are you a massive [believer]?' he questioned.

'Yes, I've had sex': During some one-on-one time together, Adam, 27, asked how invested Cartier was into her religion

She replied: 'Yes, how does that make you feel?'

To which Adam admitted: 'I don't really judge people on what they do, I'm not that dude.'

After a brief second, he then asked her thoughts on having sex before marriage.

Talking to the camera, Adam, 27, (pictured) revealed Cartier's beliefs aren't going stop him from getting to know Cartier

She responded: 'That f**ked me up hey?'

Wanting to clarify her answer, Adam asked: 'Have you ever ever had sex?' to which Cartier responded: 'Yes, I've had sex.'

Speaking about her growing feelings for Adam, Cartier said in a piece to camera: 'Adam is surprising me everyday, his banter is what's kind of drawing me to him. I love the sense of humor.'

Cartier previously told Nine she is appearing on the show to find 'a family man who can also respect her religious beliefs'.

She was raised in a very traditional way and considers herself a born-again Christian and regularly attends bible study and church.

The brunette rarely drinks alcohol, but 'doesn't mind a champagne occasionally'.
description: She's the 'born-again Christian' who wants to find a man who supports her religious beliefs.
